snippet.title: 8-Bit Adventures 2 - Official 'First Look' Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
8-Bit Adventures 2 is a retro JRPG that's more than a throwback! Explore a vast and varied world, brought to life by vibrant 8-Bit graphics, memorable NES-accurate music, and people with personality!

Try the 'First Look' Demo on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/733110  

Or get it DRM-Free on the Official Website:
www.8bitadventures2.com  

Also check out the Press Release on the official site! Inspired by the great gaming manuals of yesteryear, the 8-Bit Adventures 2 Press Release is a 13 Page Instruction Manual. Complete with information on the Characters you'll control in the 'First Look' Demo, a short Bestiary, and even a section for Notes! 

Questions? Want the Latest News?
Email - criticalgames@tpg.com.au
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CriticalGamesAU
Steam Community - http://steamcommunity.com/app/733110
Facebook - http://facebook.com/CriticalGamesDev
